data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Saint George municipality prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint George municipality, Bermuda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Saint George municipality, Bermuda that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Saint George municipality, Bermuda.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Saint George municipality to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Saint George municipality, Bermuda, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Saint George municipality to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Saint George municipality, Bermuda.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
